# Burgruine Hohenwart

Burgruine Hohenwart is a ruinous medieval castle south of the village of KÃ¶stenberg in Carinthia, Austria, first mentioned in 1144/1149 and probably built in the first half of the 12th century. It was probably ruinous by the early 16th century.
